nodes.text: Gon Tiek was a world located within the Gon Tiek system, a part of the Atravis sector in the Western Reaches portion of the Outer Rim Territories. At some point after the establishment of the Galactic Empire in 19 BBY, the 501st Legion, an elite Imperial stormtrooper unit, fought on Gon Tiek.

Gon Tiek was first mentioned in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart. The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Gon Tiek system, and therefore the world Gon Tiek, within grid square L-19.
